name: Puzzle Dice
description:
How to Play ?                                                                                                                                    

Roll the dice to the destination point by the given moves .

But how are we going to do that ?

Each level you will choose a dice .(We have 3 dices ; hook , cool , deathwish . They have equal five faces 1,2,3,5,6 . Fourth face of them is a optional face which they have unique skills .)

After you choose a dice you will toss your dice to decide which face would you start with .

1,2,3,5,6--> rolls the dice which by the chosen way.( You can see the preview before selecting the move , 1 rolls 1 unit , 2 rolls 2 unit etc.)

We have 4 tile (green,red,yellow,white):

Green:Gain EXTRA random MOVE(1-5)

Red:Return to Start or Start the game over 

Yellow:Roll RANDOM direction by (1-5) units

 White:Does absolutely nothing

DİCE TYPES

Cool Dice:CHOOSE a FACE for the next move. 

Deathwish Dice : TOSS THE DİCE , 1 means you die , 6 means you win, other number besides these nothing will happen 

Hook Dice: CHANGE the position of DESTİNATİON POİNT by selecting 1 tile next to it and roll the dice afterwards
